#summary Unit tests for data race detector.

The file [http://code.google.com/p/data-race-test/source/browse/trunk/unittest/racecheck_unittest.cc racecheck_unittest.cc] 
contains various unit tests for a data race detector. The tests are named test01, test02, and so on. For details see the source. 


To get and compile the unittests: 
{{{{
svn checkout -r $TSAN_REV http://data-race-test.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/unittest tsan_test
cd tsan_test/
make
}}}
